actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks and Public Lands.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on National Parks and Public Lands

official_title: To provide for domestic livestock grazing fees for public rangelands reflecting the fair market value of forage on those lands.
short_title: Fair Market Grazing for Public Rangelands Act of 1990

summary.text: Fair Market Grazing for Public Rangelands Act of 1990 - Establishes a livestock grazing fee structure for public lands based on base value and forage value (as defined by this Act).

titles.title: Fair Market Grazing for Public Rangelands Act of 1990
To provide for domestic livestock grazing fees for public rangelands reflecting the fair market value of forage on those lands.
